name: Sundried Tomato & Basil Artisan Crisps
description: Experience a burst of Mediterranean flavor with our Sundried Tomato & Basil Artisan Crisps. Baked in small batches using premium whole grains, each crisp is infused with sun-ripened tomatoes and fragrant basil for a perfectly balanced snack. Ideal for pairing with cheeses, dips, or enjoying straight from the bag, these gourmet crisps offer a crunchy, satisfying bite without artificial flavors or preservatives. Elevate your snack time or add a sophisticated touch to your next gathering with these irresistible treats.

attributes.ingredients: Whole wheat flour, sundried tomato, basil, olive oil, sea salt
attributes.allergens: Contains wheat. Made in a facility that processes nuts.
attributes.storage: Store in a cool, dry place
